why can't I play movies that are hosted: why can't I play movies that are hosted on a samba server?

You can, I've never been able to do it with the Google VFS thing (that is if you mount it via "Places", you have to manually mount it; mount -o username=username,password=password //location/of/share /mount/point
And remember to unmount it if you put your computer on standby, if you don't Nautulus will lock-up when you return from standby.
